sections.title: This is your future team
sections.content: A young player in the Swiss digital services market, Consort Switzerland relies on the strength of the Consort Group ecosystem to support its clients with the commitment of a dynamic, caring and locally rooted team. Already supported by a team of 10 employees, it mobilizes its resources to meet your needs in services or technical assistance with fast, efficient and personalized solutions, both human and technological.

sections.title: This is your mission
content: We are looking for an experienced OpenStack Engineer to work directly with one of our clients.
Ensure the deployment, operation and maintenance of a production OpenStack platform.
Participate in continuous architecture improvement and evolution projects.
Guarantee the reliability, security and performance of the infrastructure.
Perform advanced troubleshooting (compute, network, storage).
Automate and industrialize operations via Ansible / Terraform / scripts.
Work closely with the client's internal teams (network, security, systems).
Produce technical documentation and ensure knowledge transfer.

sections.title: This is your background
sections.content: Cloud Engineer/Administrator with at least 2-5 years of OpenStack experience.

sections.title: This is your expertise
content: Mastery of OpenStack: Nova, Neutron, Cinder, Keystone, Horizon
Good knowledge of Linux (Ubuntu, CentOS, Rocky).
Virtualization: KVM/QEMU, storage management (Ceph appreciated).
Network: TCP/IP, VLAN, VXLAN, routing, SDN basics.
Automation: Ansible, Terraform, scripting (Python/Bash).
Kubernetes / Docker knowledge = a plus.

sections.title: This is our commitment
content: At Consort Group, you are an expert we support so that every mission becomes a milestone that counts.
Attentive and human onboarding
Real managerial proximity
Continuously accessible training
Concrete commitments: inclusion, equality, solidarity
The Move Up x United Heroes program to move and breathe
A feedback culture and meaningful projects

sections.title: It's clear: The process
content: A first phone call with our recruitment team
An HR interview and a business discussion with a business engineer
A test or technical discussion with one of our experts
A final meeting with your future manager or mission leader
And if we recognize each other: we start together

recommendation.author: Anne Passera
recommendation.excerpt: Mr. Baptiste Chevassut demonstrated motivation at work and dynamism. We would like to highlight his team spirit and communication skills... The work he accomplished and his attitude gave us complete satisfaction. We warmly recommend him to any employer wishing to use his services.

items.author: Kevin Allioli
items.role: Cloud & Solutions Architect at Infomaniak Network SA
items.relation: On April 8, 2024, Kevin was Baptiste's mentor
items.content:
I highly recommend Baptiste for his work as a member of our team. Throughout our collaboration, I have been particularly impressed by his ability to understand and respond to the needs of our clients.

Baptiste has always demonstrated active listening, ensuring he understands the issues our clients are facing before proposing solutions. His ability to quickly understand complex problems and translate them into simple terms for our clients has been a real added value.

Furthermore, Baptiste has rigorously and organizedly followed the cases he was in charge of.

In summary, Baptiste is a competent and rigorous professional. His listening skills, understanding of client needs, and methodical follow-up of cases make him a solid asset for any team. I am convinced that he will be a valuable asset for any organization that will be lucky enough to have him.

items.author: Julien Cauwet
items.role: Custom web platform creation | OpenClassrooms Professor
items.relation: On March 15, 2025, Julien was Baptiste's client
items.content:
I had the immense pleasure of meeting Baptiste during a carpooling trip. What could have been a simple discussion between passengers quickly turned into a real strategic reflection session.

As the creator of the Voixlibre application, dedicated to participatory democracy, I was deep in thought about improving the user experience and the best approach to commercialization. Baptiste, with his analytical mind and relevant questions, pushed me to explore perspectives I hadn't considered. Without even knowing it at first, he was playing his business consulting role, confronting me with key questions that literally illuminated my path.

Thanks to his involvement and his listening, I was able to identify an optimal approach for evolving Voixlibre. This chance encounter was not only enriching but also decisive for my project.

I highly recommend Baptiste to anyone or any organization looking for a perceptive, curious and stimulating strategic advisor. He is a person of rare human and professional quality.

items.author: Caner Korkut
items.role: DevOps | Cloud | Cybersecurity | Building Secure & Scalable Systems
items.relation: On April 5, 2025, Caner worked with Baptiste at different companies
items.content:
I had the chance to collaborate with Baptiste on a project, and I have great memories of it. He quickly understands client needs and knows how to translate them into concrete solutions, with clarity and efficiency.

He also stands out for his awareness of environmental issues, particularly those related to the energy impact of IT fields, especially AI. He adopts a responsible and thoughtful approach, always oriented towards a more sustainable future.

With his character and skills, Baptiste is a real asset for any team :)

items.author: Siméon Gourlin
items.role: System Administrator at Infomaniak Network SA
items.relation: On July 28, 2024, Siméon held a senior position to Baptiste
items.content:
Baptiste is very curious by nature and doesn't hesitate to take on new challenges! He is also very professionally dedicated, and he makes customer satisfaction his first priority.

I really enjoyed working with him, Baptiste is someone you can count on and I recommend him without hesitation!
